segments.text: Hi , I'm Josephine Chen , the tour guide for the Jade Agency . We have a reservation of twenty rooms for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please to meet you , Miss Chen . My name is Joey.Welcome to the hotel . Here are the keys , registration slips and breakfast vouchers . Break-fast will be served from seven tomorrow morning . Is there any change in your schedule ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , our check-out time will still be 8: 30 tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we will arrange a morning call at 7:30 . Will that be fine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please put your luggage outside your room by eight . The bellboy will pick them up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . Hope you enjoy your stay .
segments.speaker: S2
